title: yEn manamE
sahitya:
En manamE unakkinda bhayam ingedu varumO ikkaliyil namakkena ulaindEn



anupallavi



mAn maruvum karattemmAn paravum perumAn guhanirukka namakku urumO
apAyam



caraNam



jnAnAkara vElan nal nAmanArAyaNi bAlan navarasa gAnAmuda shIla
kavi kunjaradAsanai kaNmaNi pOl kATTiDavE kAttirukkavE
